about_me.des: I am a first-year master student in the Department of Electrical Engineering at National Tsing Hua University(NTHU), advised by Prof. Min Sun. I am interested in machine learning and computer vision. Recently, my research focus on deep reinforcement learning.

projects.Robust 360-8PA - Redesigning The Normali: This project is submitted to ICRA 2021, and it's still under submission.

career.nthu_des: I start my master degree at in Department of Electrical Engineering(EE) at NTHU, advised by Prof. Min Sun.
career.nchu_des: I get my B.S. degree in Department of Bio-Industrial Mechatronics Engineering(BIME) at National Chung Hsing University(NCHU).
career.pmml_des: I become a undergraduate student at PMML, advised by Prof. Yao-Chuan Tasi.
